Check your inbox for an email by Criptext and click the link within to verify your new Recovery Email.
Note: Changing your recovery email will disable two-factor authentication.
Next time you sign in on another device you\'ll have to enter your password and then validate the sign in from an existing device.
To enable Two-Factor Authentication you must set and verify a recovery email on your account

string.name: message_warning_2_two_fa
string.b: Please go to Settings > Account > Recovery Email to complete this step.

resources.string: A password reset link was sent to: %1$s Link will expire in 30 mins.

 recovery email was set on your account. For further assistance contact as: 

 support@criptext.com

A recovery email address has not been set up or confirmed for this account, without it you cannot reset password
Confirm your new password.\nIf you cancel, the device will sign out and all local data will be erased.
Password has been updated for this device.
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Since this is your only active device, 2FA will be turned off if you sign out. Would you like to continue?
WARNING: Deleting your account will erase all mailbox and account data on all devices as well as disable your username from being used in the future.\nAre you sure you want to delete your account?
Removing this device will cause it to sign out from your account remotely.
If you forget your PIN code you\'ll have to sign out and sign back in again.
Warning: 10 failed attempts will result in all data to be erased from the app for security purposes.
Are you sure you want to sign out?

If disabled, you won\'t be able to know when others read your emails.
Set a passphrase and share it with non-Criptext recipients so they can read your email.
Note: non-Criptext email addresses will receive a normal, un-encrypted email.
Encrypted emails to non-Criptext recipients will expire in 10 days
Password must be at least 8 characters.
At least 3 characters. Must begin with letters A-Z.

Your secure email experience starts now. Be ready for privacy without compromise.
Criptext doesn\'t collect email data. Your emails are only stored on your device.
You create information, we believe you have a right to own it.

Know when your emails are opened or read. If turned off, you wonâ€™t send or receive read receipts.

Backup your entire mailbox to Google Drive so that you can restore your Criptext account to a new device if you lose this device. Note: Google Drive backups are not encrypted and Criptext is not responsible for your Google Drive data.
Note: Auto Backup works only with cloud backup
If you lose/forget this passphrase you won\'t be able to restore this backup in the future
Note: for your security we suggest you chose to encrypt the backup file.
Restore your emails from a local backup or Google Drive. This can be done later from Settings > Mailbox Backup > Restore Backup

Session has expired. Please log back in.
Enter the custom domain you wish to add
This domain is already in use
By adding a custom domain you will be able to add a custom alias allowing you to send and receive emails from your custom domain.
1. Go to Go Daddy or whomever your domain provider is and access the DNS Manager where you can add MX and text records.
2. Delete any existing MX records before proceeding.
Add the following records in your DNS Manager. This will verify your domain ownership and configure Criptext email settings. Need help?
If you see the field Time To Live, enter 3600 seconds (1hour). Your host may not include a field called \"Name\", \"Host\", or \"Alias\".
Are you sure you want to delete your domain? Your mails will not disapear, but aliases with this domain will be deleted.
MX Records for domain: %1$s not found.
Go back and verify that you\'ve added the right information into your DNS records.
DNS Records For This\nDomain Were Not Found

%1$s is listed as your domain, make sure this is right; otherwise correct the domain on your Company Profile. Need help?\n\nAlso check that the DNS records on your domain are not empty; otherwise go back and add them from the previous steps.
Try again in a couple of minutes. Need help?
Create a secondary address for your existing inbox. You can add up to 3 aliases per domain.
You will be able to send and receive emails from this new address.
This address is already in use.
A new alias was added ðŸŽ‰
If you delete this Alias your emails will remain intact, but you will no longer be able to send or receive emails under that address. \n\nAre you sure you want to delete %1$s?
You have reached the max aliases you can create (%1$s) for this domain.
Aliases ending in @criptext.com cannot be deleted within 15 days from the day they were created.\n\nDays remaining: %1$d
Help us bring more awesome features to all, by joining Criptext Plus.
Add custom email addresses with a Domain that you already own like you@company.com \n\nHelp us bring more awesome features to all, by joining Criptext Plus.
With Aliases you can manage multiple addresses in one inbox.\n\nHelp us bring more awesome features to all, by joining Criptext Plus.
